channel.title: Chat/Text Colour
channel.description:
Hello, I know its is possible but I wanna know how. How do I change the standard text colour u type to chat? I saw a server (Called VRSCAPE) where they had like red and wave. you could type this as red:wave: hey. I think and you will get the same result but I want everyone to type like that. does anyone have any idea?
maybe add some @whi@ somewhere to make it type white?
_TM told me to try it here so any suggestions?
Thanks alot
Div.

item.title: Chat/Text Colour
item.dc:creator: @Divilium Divilium
item.description:
@Divilium wrote:

Hello,
I know its is possible but I wanna know how.
